data.actual_result: It only appears once you login, forcing you to use CTRL+V instead if you wish to paste your email/password/auth code into the respective fields
data.expected_result: Right-click context menu should appear when initionally attempting it on one of the login information fields so that you can click it
data.short_description: Right-click context menu for pasting in the login information fields on the Discord desktop apps doesn't appear until you actually login, which then displays it in the middle of your Online list
data.steps_to_repro: - Logout of Discord if you're not already - Right-click in one of the information sections as though to paste information related to the respective field - Proceed to login and observe as the "Paste" is present on your screen
